mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT sessionNum,TO_CHAR(sessionDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') sessionDate,cs.concertNum ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by sessionDate order by sessionDate) cnt FROM concertSession cs JOIN concert c on cs.concertNum=c.concertNum ) WHERE cnt=1 AND concertNum=#{concertNum} AND sessionDate > #{today} ORDER BY sessionDate ASC, concertNum DESC
